Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A wide variety of ATM mutation types , including missense mutations and in - frame deletions , were seen in these patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ATM mutations |

The paragraph does not mention any specific disease name, only the type of mutations in the ATM gene.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ATM mutations |

The paragraph only mentions "ATM mutations" as a potential disease entity. Other terms such as "missense mutations" and "in-frame deletions" are not diseases but types of mutations that can cause diseases.
